python_iitp.console¶

python_iitp.radon¶

python_iitp.radon.radon_transform(input_image, output_shape=None)¶

Discrete Radon Transform for lines.

Parameters:

  • input_image (ndarray) – Image to be transformed.

  • output_shape (Optional[Any]) – Shape of the output image (None).

Return type:

ndarray

Returns:

Transformed image.

Example

>>> from PIL import Image
>>> img = Image.open('path/to/image.jpg')
>>> transformed_image = radon_transform(image)
True
